extensionDescription.message: Stay up to date with the bounties available on your Twitch Sponsorship Portal

twitchCampaignWebhook_messageContent.message: $1 has received a new Twitch Sponsorship campaign and should be available on your Sponsorship Portal if you're eligible!

testWebhook_messageContent.message: This is a test webhook sent by $1. If you see this message, the next notifications you'll receive will also be shared here.
